bool WarheadTypeExt::WarheadTypeExt::ExtData::applyKillDriver ( BulletClass *  Bullet  ) 

This function checks if the KillDriver effect should be applied, and, if so, applies it.

Parameters:
Bullet Pointer to the bullet
Returns:
true if the effect was applied, false if not
Author:
Renegade
Date:
05.04.10
Todo:
This needs to be refactored to work with the generic warhead SW. I want to create a generic cellspread function first.

Todo:
Change this to "kill one driver and eject everyone else"

00283         if(!Bullet->Target || !this->KillDriver) {
00284                 return false;

00286                 TechnoTypeClass *pTargetType = pTarget->GetTechnoType();

00292

00297                                         FootClass *passenger = pTarget->Passengers.RemoveFirstPassenger();
00298                                         passenger->RegisterDestruction(Bullet->Owner);
00299                                         passenger->UnInit();
00300                                 }
00301                         }
00302                         // If this unit is driving under influence, we have to free it first
00303                         if(TechnoClass *Controller = pTarget->MindControlledBy) {
00304                                 if(CaptureManagerClass *MC = Controller->CaptureManager) {
00305                                         MC->FreeUnit(pTarget);
00306                                 }
00307                         }
00308 
00309                         // Hand over to Civilian/Special house
00310                         pTarget->SetOwningHouse(HouseClass::FindByCountryIndex(HouseTypeClass::FindIndexOfName("Special")));
00311                         return true;
00312                 } else {
00313                         return false;
00314                 }
00315         }
00316         return false;

bool WarheadTypeExt::WarheadTypeExt::ExtData::applyPermaMC ( CoordStruct *  coords,
HouseClass *  Owner,
ObjectClass *  Target 
)

This function checks if the passed warhead has MindControl.Permanent set, and, if so, applies the effect.

Note:
Moved here from hook BulletClass_Fire.
Parameters:
coords The coordinates of the warhead impact, the center of the Mind Control animation.
Owner Owner of the Mind Control effect, i.e. the one controlling the target afterwards.
Target Target of the Mind Control effect, i.e. the one being controlled by the owner afterwards.
Returns:
false if effect wasn't applied, true if it was. This is important for the chain of damage effects, as, in case of true, the target is now a friendly unit. 
00186                                                                                                     {
00187         if (this->MindControl_Permanent && Target) {
00188                 if (TechnoClass *pTarget = generic_cast<TechnoClass *>(Target)) {
00189                         TechnoTypeClass *pType = pTarget->GetTechnoType();
00190 
00191                         if (!pType || pType->ImmuneToPsionics) {
00192                                 return false; // should return 0 in hook
00193                         }
00194                         if (pTarget->MindControlledBy) {
00195                                 pTarget->MindControlledBy->CaptureManager->FreeUnit(pTarget);
00196                         }
00197                         pTarget->SetOwningHouse(Owner, 1);
00198                         pTarget->MindControlledByAUnit = 1;
00199                         pTarget->QueueMission(mission_Guard, 0);
00200 
00201                         CoordStruct XYZ = *coords;
00202                         XYZ.Z += pType->MindControlRingOffset;
00203 
00204                         AnimClass *MCAnim;
00205                         GAME_ALLOC(AnimClass, MCAnim, RulesClass::Instance->PermaControlledAnimationType, &XYZ);
00206                         AnimClass *oldMC = pTarget->MindControlRingAnim;
00207                         if (oldMC) {
00208                                 oldMC->UnInit();
00209                         }
00210                         pTarget->MindControlRingAnim = MCAnim;
00211                         MCAnim->SetOwnerObject(pTarget);
00212                         return true; // should return 0x469AA4 in hook
00213                 }
00214         }
00215         return false;
00216 }

void WarheadTypeExt::WarheadTypeExt::ExtData::LoadFromINIFile ( TT *  pThis,
CCINIClass *  pINI 
) [virtual] 

00035 {
00036         const char * section = pThis->ID;
00037 
00038         INI_EX exINI(pINI);
00039 
00040         if(!pINI->GetSection(section)) {
00041                 return;
00042         }
00043 
00044         // writing custom verses parser just because
00045         if(pINI->ReadString(section, "Verses", "", Ares::readBuffer, Ares::readLength)) {
00046                 int idx = 0;
00047                 for(char *cur = strtok(Ares::readBuffer, ","); cur; cur = strtok(NULL, ",")) {
00048                         this->Verses[idx].Parse(cur);
00049                         ++idx;
00050                         if(idx > 10) {
00051                                 break;
00052                         }
00053                 }
00054         }
00055 
00056         ArmorType::LoadForWarhead(pINI, pThis);
00057 
00058         if(pThis->MindControl) {
00059                 this->MindControl_Permanent = pINI->ReadBool(section, "MindControl.Permanent", this->MindControl_Permanent);
00060         }
00061 
00062         this->EMP_Duration = pINI->ReadInteger(section, "EMP.Duration", this->EMP_Duration);
00063         this->EMP_Cap = pINI->ReadInteger(section, "EMP.Cap", this->EMP_Cap);
00064 
00065         this->IC_Duration = pINI->ReadInteger(section, "IronCurtain.Duration", this->IC_Duration);
00066 
00067         if(pThis->Temporal) {
00068                 this->Temporal_WarpAway.Parse(&exINI, section, "Temporal.WarpAway");
00069         }
00070 
00071         this->DeployedDamage = pINI->ReadDouble(section, "Damage.Deployed", this->DeployedDamage);
00072 
00073         this->Ripple_Radius = pINI->ReadInteger(section, "Ripple.Radius", this->Ripple_Radius);
00074 
00075         this->AffectsEnemies = pINI->ReadBool(section, "AffectsEnemies", this->AffectsEnemies);
00076 
00077         this->InfDeathAnim.Parse(&exINI, section, "InfDeathAnim");
00078 
00079         this->KillDriver = pINI->ReadBool(section, "KillDriver", this->KillDriver);
00080 };
